utterances: I just got off a video call with my family.
Do you talk often with your family? How is your deployment in the army?
Honestly, the conversations have become few and far between. I really do miss them.
I am very busy at work. What books are you reading now?
Well, my Lieutenant actually suggested to me that I look into Stephen King. I
One of the great writers but sometimes I find myself getting bored while reading some of his works.

Yeah, I've heard they're quite a commitment due to the length. But, right now, I'm in no rush lol. It might be nice to get lost in a long story. It might even help me sleep. Are you reading any books, right now?
I am reading one for the money by Janet Evanovich. I guess that is the pull of a good book. To get lost in the story.
Oh, right you mentioned that you liked her. I really want to check her out. Would you recommend that one as the first one by her I should look up?
[[blender2-3B:19]]
You know, I have just heard Clair de lune on my radio. I am sure. that have to learn how to play it as soon as possible
I wish I knew how to play an instrument. I love listening to classical music though. Are there any other works by Debussy that you like other than Claire De Lune?
[[blender2-3B:20]]
My wife found a new job teaching and i have found some cars for you to look at
That is so awesome! Will she be teaching again? Also, I can't wait to see the cars you picked out! You know I love fast ones!
[[blender2-3B:24]]
After we talked, I dreamt about tacos :)
I love it when my dreams are like that. Which kind of taco did you get? I know what I would have ordered
I got street tacos. I was really hungry when I woke up.. Ha!
I can imagine! Did you say anything while you were sleeping? I bet your partner thought you were putting in an order.
Lol! Probably. Have you been to any good taco places lately?
I have not. I've been trying to cook more and perfect my own taco recipe.
That sounds fun! How is it coming? What kind of meat do you prefer in your tacos?
I've actually been trying out some of these new meat alternatives. I love my beef, but I'm trying to do better for the earth. It's surprisingly good
Really? What kinds of alternatives have you tried? I have been curious about those.
[[blender2-3B:26]]
I baked a really nice cake yesterday!
Oh nice, I love cake! What kind of cake was it?
[[blender2-3B:49]]
I saw the new movie and it was great!
Lucky you! How was it? Was it as great as you thought it would be?
It was very well done! I thought that the plot was very fresh, and the directors and actors kept it on point! I watched it with friends, and we had some snacks there too! Have you seen it yet?
No I haven't seen it yet. I've been busy here lately trying to fix my atv.
You should see it! What happened to your ATV? Did you have a wreck?
No I didn't wreck. It is making a weird grinding sound when it runs. I'm not a mechanic but trying to fix it myself to save money.
That's good! My brother had a wreck on a four-wheeler, and had to have his neck in a brace for months! Did you try watching any Youtube videos? They have great suggestions!
Oh that is awful! Is he ok now? I have watched a few workout vids on youtube but not much else lately.
He had some pins put in his spine, but he healed really well! No more crazy stunts for him though! I watch workout videos too! What kinds do you like?
I workout with those stretchy bands. I can't remember what they are called lol. They have different weight amounts on them that can be combined.
Resistance bands? That's very smart! I like using those too, so that you don't tear something, like you can with heavy weights. I watch a wide variety of jogging/running tips for marathons too!
[[blender2-3B:50]]
I just ate a piece of chocolate cake that I thought was very good.
Oh really? Awesome. I am sure that you enjoyed that! I was thinking about baking one.
[[blender2-3B:90]]
Maybe you should put Benny on your online dating profile!
Haha, do you think Benny will attract other people to me?
[[blender2-3B:95]]
What kind of things do you upload on your YouTube channel?
I like to travel and take videos. I usually upload those good videos I take while traveling. Did you buy bitcoin when it was very low?
No I bought it a couple months ago but still have made a decent profit!
That is wonderful. I am confused by stock marked and only know bitcoin from the news. Do you have any plan to go to Thailand in the near future?

Yeah it can get a bit confusing, but once you understand it becomes addicting! I actually was just talking about planning a trip within the next few months. I've looked up flights last night! I know you want to go to Thailand, when are you thinking of going?
[[blender2-3B:96]]
I have made it to Kyoto and it is wonderful.

Have you found a lot of things to do? I know I would like to travel to Japan someday. I'm taking a long road trip with my wife in the fall to the coast. I don't think I'm doing any flying for a while.
There is so much to do, its a beautiful city. Iv been playing in some amazing arcades and eating exquisite food. How comes you are not flying for a while?
I got caught up in the REAL ID mess and don't have a proper ID for it. I'm waiting on my passport and new ID card to come in. I also wanted to save for a longer trip overseas for a while.
Gotcha, i have to tell you about this place in Kyoto, its an arcade, they have Mario Kart, but its full VR and you sit in a life sized Mario Kart!
That sounds like so much fun! I love arcade games. Do you enjoy crane games? I spend too much money on them sometimes.
I dont like crane games, when i was a kid my Dad told me they were rigged but i still put my entire vacation money in to one trying to win a giant Snorlax. My favourite games are driving games.
Did you eventually get the giant Snorlax? I used to love the Driving USA and Driving World series. The ones they used to have at every pizza parlor? I'm getting old, I can't remember the actual name.
[[blender2-3B:98]]
Do you have any pets since you love dogs so much?
I do have a dog, she's a labradoodle named Leah. She's quite a handful but so very sweet. Do you have any pets?
Labradoodles are great! I have a dog as well - a chocolate lab. He's a good boy, but also a handful. Do you ever take Leah to the dog park?
We don't have a dark park close but I wish we did. How has work been going for you?
Work is going well - people have been very generous lately with the tips! How about for you - any new book recommendations from the book store?
I'm so glad to hear that. We actually had a busy weekend at work. We had an author come in for a book reading and that brought in a lot of new customers.
Well that's great! Had you read the author's book previously?

I had not. She only read a part of the book though, so I brought home a copy so I could finish. It's seems very interesting, it's a murder mystery novel. Have you had any time to ride your motorcycle or race lately?
Oh, I enjoy a good murder mystery as well! I have ridden my motorcycle lately. I won't be riding for a while, though...I fell off and broke my leg!
Oh no! I'm sorry to hear that. I bet that must make work really tough for you. Do you have crutches to help you get around?

It's been an adjustment, but I think it has been helping with the sympathy tips! Actually, they gave me on of those scooters where you put one leg up and roll around, so carrying trays is a bit easier since it has a crate.
I didn't think about sympathy tips, haha! That's awesome. It's stinks that you broke you're leg, but I guess silver lining you know? I'm sorry you'll miss that race next month.
[[blender2-3B:133]]

That sounds interesting. What kind of project was it?

Maybe we should work together if you want to play drums while I rap?
Oh yeah drumming and rapping that is new. It may work! In fact I like rap too. Do you have a favorite artist? I think Drake is decent but I like Eninem too

My favorite artist when it comes to rap is probably Yung Gravy. The style is a bit different than those two so maybe it wouldn't work... we could try rapping together while you play. We could try street performing together?
Would love to try that. I know a friend that can join us on the street too. He is a break dancing guy. He and I have been performing for a nearly year you know. Anyways how's life?

It's been busy with the kids lately. Their schooling has been getting harder and I don't know if I can even understand their assignments anymore. I've had to order so much take-out that it's been killing my bank account and my savings for my dream'vette. How about you?

I feel you. It must be very difficult for you. Well I don't have any kids so nothing is breaking the bank on my part. Oh yeah I remember you've been saving for Corvette. If you want you can bring your family over to my place and prepare sushi together
That would be great! I couldn't believe how good your sushi was last time we got together. Have you thought of opening a restaurant? You could perform and cook.
[[blender2-3B:145]]
I took your advice and got my child a hamster!
So exciting! How is your child enjoying the responsibility of being a pet owner?
[[blender2-3B:167]]
After putting the kids to bed, I listened to the Rolling Stones with my husband.
I can't relate as I have no kids
Do you think you ever will? You've been with your GF for a while now right? Have you ever spoken about marriage and kids?
some day I will right now i have focus my time and energy to improving my life
What specifically do you want to improve?
my health goals and business goals
What are you health and business goals?
[[blender2-3B:170]]
I just got a brand new pair of hiking boots for our upcoming plans!
Where do you plan to try them? In the mountains?
You inspired me to try them on a hike! We are going camping near a nice trail. I am sure we will see some cute critters out there. Where is the best place you've hiked?
I like to hike in place where there is a lot of wilderness, state parks. Yellowstone is my favorite place.
Are you from California or just traveled there? I always wanted to go to Thailand.
I don't like camping, so I stay in hotels or rent a cabin. Are there any interesting mountains to climb in Thailand?
I am not sure, but I do know the waterfalls are gorgeous. Do you know how to swim?
I want to swim more because I am a little overweight, I eat too much chicken nuggets.
I am also worried about the food in Thailand, so maybe I will have to pack my own chicken nuggets. What do you like to wash the nuggets down with? My favorite drink is root beer.
[[blender2-3B:186]]
I really hope I get the job at the school.
Have faith, I am sure you will be successful in getting the job. What kind of translating work do you do?

I can translate anything from English, Spanish, French, and Portuguese. I'm currently learning Mandarin to add to my resume. I always like learning new languages. The job at the school would mainly be English and Spanish translations though.

That is so impressive, I wish I could speak multiple languages and be skilled enough to serve as a translator. WIth those kinds of skills, I am sure you can find a job in many places if you tried. Was there a language you struggled the most in trying to learn?

French was the hardest, as Spanish and Portuguese are quite close. Unfortunately, a lot of people that need translators already have them for the languages I know. That's why I think learning Mandarin will help. But enough about me, how are things going for you?

Its going well, my band and I have been practicing and preparing for a show thats going to happen in a couple of weeks. I'm a bit nervous about it, we normally have played for smaller gigs with a smaller crowd.
Is this a big gig? I'll bet your band is super excited to get more attention.
[[blender2-3B:189]]
Hey how is the band going?
It's going well, thanks for asking! Really starting to pick up. Maybe I could get you tickets to a show soon?
Yes! I would like to go to one of their shows. Do they have any upcoming shows in NYC? How is work going?

Yeah they have a couple next month, I'll send you through the ticket! It's alright, been busy recently, but I'm off this weekend at least. Thinking about doing some painting. How about you? You still balancing work and college alright?

Thank you! Maybe we can grab dinner before one of their shows if you have time. I am glad you get a little time off. You deserve it. You are alwas so busy. What are you going to paint? Yes, my schedule is constantly hectic and stressful.

Wow! Is this your official first trip flying yourself?
Yes it was! So excited to finally take my plane out for a spin. It was a long flight but totally worth it, the beaches in the Bahamas are gorgeous
Sounds beautiful! That was a great choice for your first trip. Not too far but still exotic.
Thanks, I'm very happy about my choices. Wish I could've brought you with me but those small planes need a pretty specific weight balance. A cigarette on the beach sounds fantastic
I wish too! But knowing you, I'm sure that you'll have tons of pictures to show me, right?
Oh for sure. Every single palm tree and shell got a snapshot. I get so locked on in beautiful places like that, so much to capture. If I come over for dinner one night I can bring my photos along!
Yes! Definitely plan on dinner. What are you doing this weekend?

Have a concert I'm excited for! I'm going to see 100 gecs, I dont know if you have heard of them. They are kind of a weird band but I love there music, they draw influence from a bunch of different genres
No, I've never heard of 100 gecs. Are they alternative or indie? I like both genres with some pop too.
[[blender2-3B:265]]
I caught an impressive fish.
Oh really? What kind of fish did you catch? I love to eat fish, but have never really been fishing.
It was a big ole Blue Marlin! What kind of fish do you enjoy eating? Do you have any suggestions on cooking fish?

I actually enjoy fresh salmon, which I just saute with some butter and garlic. I have never tried any Blue Marlin. That must have been fun catching it. I miss living in New England. Do you still live there?
I do still live in New England. It was quite exciting when I caught it. I've always noticed that the boxes of fish fry are always so salty.
Yes, they really are. You can actually just make your own by mixing different spices together, and its not nearly as salty.

I bought some immediately regretted it afterwards, because of the saltiness. I also noticed that it's way easier to cook fish in butter rather than oil, if it's not breaded. How is it living in California?
[[blender2-3B:268]]

The people needed to know what they did was wrong. I knew no one was gonna get hurt but I'm happy knowing they lost a lot of money.
Doing what is right is always good but you must think about it multiple times before doing anything that can hurt innocent people.
Yeah this was a one time thing I won't be doing it again. I'm going to start learning a voice for a new show coming out.

He is a professional baseball player. And yeah, maye I should relax. I like going to Seattle and thinking about life there. Maybe I will do that soon.

[[blender2-3B:412]]
I went fishing last week, it was super great and I caught a lot of fish!
That sounds awesome! Where did you go fishing?
[[blender2-3B:417]]
Unfortunately, my goldfish aren't getting along.

Yea that sometimes happens with fish. My diet is going alright, I'm in a bit of a slump because I'm getting burnt out on the same meals everyday. I would love recommendations of new healthy recipes!
Sorry to hear that. I will try to find some recipes for you. How is the veterinarian process? Any schooling yet?
I'm volunteering at a veterinarian's office right now, getting some experience and observation hours. I hope to start schooling soon but need to get more hours before I apply.
That is great! I am happy for you. Always nice when we can reach our goals. Unfortunately, I have been a little too busy lately to work on opening a restaurant.

It will be a while. I have had some family illness related setbacks. Also, I still have a few more business training courses to take.
I'm sorry to hear about the illnesses, are they doing ok? Will that push you back or are you still roughly on the same time schedule?

I have some new equipment ordered for my trip.
What new equipment did you order?
[[blender2-3B:422]]
Have you started packing yet for your move?
Yes, I have slowly been packing each day. I am also finding that I can get rid of quite a bit of stuff that I won't need out west. How is your job going?
My job is still pretty busy. It's great that you can get rid of stuff. Have you heard of "minimalism"?
I have heard of minimalism. I am not sure that I can get my belongings down that much but because I will be outdoors the majority of the time, I won't need a lot of my electronics
In that case, you can probably get rid of all of your electronics, right? Do you usually use them a lot?
I am a big music buff so I will be keeping my phone and headphones, but at this point I am not sure that I will need any of my other electronics.
That sounds nice. I feel pretty addicted to my electronics, honestly. Actually, I guess I'm more addicted to the internet.
Yeah, I have been able to move away from the internet, I don't have any social media. Have you found any time to get outside and run?
Wow, I can't imagine not having social media. It must be freeing. Yes, I've been finding 20 minutes in the evenings to go on a run. I want to try other sports though.

I think I may livestream Sekiro sometime soon instead of the usual debates. That way you could check the game out too if you want!

It was cutting it a little close but we were prepared. Had the crib ready, put some nice wallpaper, baby monitor. We were ready to go. I'm glad it was all done and you will be to.
I hope so, it's hard with me being so sick at the moment but I'm sure I will start feeling better soon. How old are your kids now?
My son is 10 and my daughter is 8. I hope your sickness goes away soon. Do you want a boy or a girl?

Oh that is a good gap between the two of them, my husband wants us to try again so we only have a couple of years between them. Do yours get along well? and thankyou I do too. My husband wants a boy but I'm just worried about them being healthy, gender doesn't matter to me.

I found an English Bulldog breeder! I would love for you to come with me and take a look if you can.
Oh, that's excellent! I'd love to come along. How did you find this breeder?

My dog and I ran for one hour today.

How are things going on the job hunt front? Have you gotten any interviews yet?

That's true! Well tell me more about this job possibility. What's it for, where's it at, stuff like that.
Well, it's near my place downtown, in-office fortunately since I'm not great at working from home. It's pretty much your standard 9 to 5 gig.
Cool. I hope you get it! Good luck and be sure and tell me all about it after it's over. If you get the job I'll buy you a new book to celebrate!
Woohoo! Though then I guess I wouldn't have as much time to read, haha. Did you start reading that new series yet?
Not yet but I've bought them. It's all HG Wells novels. Some of them I had never heard of before and I'm looking forward to getting into them.
Sweet! You'll have to let me know how you wind up liking them. I've been more into Rothfuss lately, but I can always go back to Wells.

[[blender2-3B:459]]
My cruise just made its first stop and I went on a snorkeling tour.

[[blender2-3B:473]]
Gracye got out but I managed to catch her.

[[blender2-3B:474]]

[[blender2-3B:477]]
What kind of cats do you have?

I have one Russian Blue male and the rest are all plain domestic shorthairs. One is an orange male, one is a black female, and one is an absolutely enormous 20-pound tabby male. How is your job search going? Are you looking for a medical job?
Wow that's so many! How do they get along? My job search its going well, I got a couple of offers from doctor's offices. My wife got a job though, so our financial situation its less volatile.

They all get along really well, they've been together since they were very young. They're all former strays. Three of them (the shorthairs) are all sixteen so it's like a kitty nursing home in here sometimes, haha. I'm glad the job search is going well, and that the financial situation is more stable. It's so stressful to be short of money!

Good on you for rescuing strays! Are you going to rescue more, since some are getting older? And it is such a relief. I was worried we were gonna have to explain to your daughters why her moms were so stressed, but I think she doesn't know we were broke for a bit. She is too young to have to hear about family budget issues.

We are going to try to take some time off from cats for a bit after...well, you know. Nature takes its course. Vet bills for older cats are expensive since they need to go more often and need more testing. We're considering getting a puppy. Our two dogs now are rescues, but I had a Basset Hound that I raised from puppyhood til she died at 15, and I'm finally at the point where I can handle having another. I think it's a good idea to not let your daughter know about the money issues. Kids can really internalize stuff like that as being "their fault" somehow.

Yeah I can imagine it gets hard when they get old. A puppy might be a nice change of pace! We've been thinking about getting a kitten for our daughter now that life is more balanced out. And I agree, kids don't need to reach adulthood too early.
Kittens are great. I think they're actually better for kids than puppies sometimes because kittens will be more companionate and they're easier to care for - no walking!
Oh definitely! They're also more self sufficient, so we don't need to constantly provide a kitten with attention.

Yes. And may I suggest, if you get two, it's not that much more expensive than one once shots are over with, and if the family is out for the day or on a weekend trip they can keep each other company.

That sounds smart. I've heard that cats do prefer to live together as bonded pairs, so once I choose which doctor's office I'm going to join and find my salary, we may look into getting two. It is. weird being an out of work doctor, but it does mean that once I get a job back we'll have more than enough money. My wife is making enough right now as a professor, but I want us to be financially comfortable.
What field of medicine are you in, and what does your wife teach? My husband is a librarian at a university.

I finally moved to the federal court house.

[[blender2-3B:488]]

I heard there was an accident involving a truck close to you are you okay
